backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a salad bowl business management system with authorization, inventory tracking, product/recipe management, invoicing, customer profiles with health metrics (BMI), subscriptions, orders, and stock transactions.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing JSON summaries of all frontend components, pages, and utilities including authentication, inventory, products, billing, subscriptions, reports, and CSV export functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes including colors for UI components, charts, and sidebar elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/README.md: Documentation for the Salad Khatora business management system explaining Internet Identity authentication flow, features (dashboard, inventory, products, billing, subscriptions, customers, reports), and technology stack.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application with TanStack Router configuration defining admin routes (with Internet Identity protection) and user routes (with customer authentication and cart context), plus QueryClient setup.
frontend/src/components/AlertPanel.tsx: Alert panel component displaying mock low stock warnings and expiring subscription notifications with placeholder comment for future email integration.
frontend/src/components/BillingForm.tsx: Form component for creating invoices with customer details, multiple product line items, payment mode selection, and discount calculation. Currently uses hardcoded product data with TODOs for backend integration.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: Side drawer component displaying cart items with quantity controls, item removal, and checkout navigation. Shows empty state when cart is empty and calculates total price.
frontend/src/components/CustomerForm.tsx: Form component for adding new customers with fields for name, phone, email, address, and preferences. Includes email validation and uses the useAddCustomer mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/CustomerList.tsx: Table component displaying customer list with checkboxes for bulk selection and individual message sending actions. Shows loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/CustomerLoginBut: Button component handling customer authentication (login/logout) with Internet Identity, managing login state and clearing query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/CustomerProtecte: Route guard component that redirects unauthenticated users to login page and shows loading screen during authentication initialization.
frontend/src/components/DashboardMetrics: Dashboard widget displaying key business metrics (daily/weekly/monthly sales, cash flow, expenses) in card format with icons. Fetches data using useAnalyticsMetrics hook.
frontend/src/components/EditIngredientDi: Dialog component for editing existing ingredient details including name, supplier, quantity, cost price, and low stock threshold. Uses form validation and the useUpdateIngredient hook to persist changes.
frontend/src/components/EditProductDialo: Dialog component for editing salad bowl product details including name, bowl size, price, and active status. Integrates with useBowlSizes and useUpdateProduct hooks for data management.
frontend/src/components/EditRecipeDialog: Dialog component for modifying product recipes by adding/removing ingredients and adjusting quantities. Uses useEditRecipe hook to save recipe changes with validation.
frontend/src/components/EditSubscription: Dialog component for editing subscription details including customer info, plan type, bowl size, dates, payment status, and remaining deliveries. Auto-calculates end dates based on plan duration and uses useEditSubscription hook.
frontend/src/components/IngredientForm.t: Form component for adding new ingredients with fields for name, supplier, quantity, cost price, and low stock threshold. Uses useAddIngredient hook and resets form on successful submission.
frontend/src/components/IngredientList.t: Displays a table of ingredients with quantity, cost, supplier, and low-stock alerts. Supports editing and deleting ingredients with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/InvoiceList.tsx: Shows a table of recent invoices with customer details, items, payment mode, and date. Currently uses mock data pending backend integration.
frontend/src/components/KOTPrintView.tsx: Renders a printable Kitchen Order Ticket listing active subscription plans with customer names, bowl sizes, plan types, and remaining deliveries.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper with navigation sidebar, authentication checks, and logout functionality. Redirects unauthenticated users to login page.
frontend/src/components/NotificationDial: Dialog for sending bulk notifications to selected customers with a message textarea and recipient badge list.
frontend/src/components/OrderStatusDropd: Dropdown select component for updating order status (pending, preparing, ready, delivered) with confirmation dialog before changes.
frontend/src/components/OrderStatusTimel: Visual timeline component showing order progress through four stages with icons and completion indicators.
frontend/src/components/ProductDetailDia: Dialog component displaying detailed product information including image, bowl size, price, ingredients, and quantity selector with add-to-cart functionality.
frontend/src/components/ProductForm.tsx: Form component for creating new salad bowl products with fields for name, bowl type, price, and dynamic recipe ingredients list.
frontend/src/components/ProductList.tsx: Displays grid of product cards with availability toggle, edit/delete actions, and dialogs for editing recipes and product details.
frontend/src/components/SalesChart.tsx: Tabbed chart component showing sales and profit data with daily, weekly, and monthly views using line and bar charts (currently using mock data).
frontend/src/components/StockInTab.tsx: Form and table for recording incoming stock transactions with ingredient selection, quantity, supplier, and cost price fields, plus transaction history display.
frontend/src/components/StockOutTab.tsx: Form component for recording stock-out transactions with ingredient selection, quantity validation, and reason input. Displays a table of historical stock-out transactions using StockTransactionTable.
frontend/src/components/StockStatusTab.t: Displays current inventory status in a table with total value calculation, edit/delete actions per ingredient, and a dialog to add new ingredients. Includes confirmation dialogs for deletion.
frontend/src/components/StockTransaction: Reusable table component that displays stock transactions sorted by date, showing ingredient name, quantity, type badges (Stock In/Out/Write Off), reason, supplier, and cost price.
frontend/src/components/SubscriptionForm: Form for creating new subscriptions with customer details, plan type (weekly/monthly), bowl size selection, pricing, and auto-calculated end dates based on plan duration.
frontend/src/components/SubscriptionList: Grid display of subscription cards showing customer info, plan details, expiry status with badges, and edit/delete actions. Includes expiry warnings and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/UserLayout.tsx: Customer-facing layout wrapper with sticky header, navigation menu (Menu, Track Order, Dashboard), cart drawer integration, and mobile-responsive sheet menu.
Displays the customer-facing menu of active salad bowls with images, prices, and 'Add to Cart' functionality. Handles loading states and empty menu scenarios.
frontend/src/components/UserOrdersSectio: Shows a customer's order history with order details including items, delivery address, payment mode, status badges, and timestamps. Displays loading and empty states appropriately.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSecti: Provides a form for customers to view and edit their profile including contact info, dietary preferences, and health metrics (gender, age, height, weight). Calculates and displays BMI with validation.
frontend/src/components/WriteOffTab.tsx: Admin interface for recording inventory write-offs with ingredient selection, quantity input, and reason. Displays historical write-off transactions in a table.
frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx: React context providing shopping cart state management with add, update, remove, clear operations and total calculation. Persists cart data to sessionStorage.
frontend/src/contexts/CustomerAuthContex: React context wrapping Internet Identity authentication for customers, providing login/logout functions and authentication status. Exposes identity and initialization state to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Initializes access control with admin token and invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend data operations including analytics, products, customers, orders, subscriptions, inventory, recipes, and user profiles with mutations and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color palette (fresh green and warm orange theme), dark mode support, mobile-friendly touch targets, and print styles optimized for kitchen order tickets.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/BillingPage.tsx: Billing page with tabbed interface for creating new invoices and viewing invoice history using BillingForm and InvoiceList components.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Customer checkout page with order summary, delivery form validation (name, phone, address), payment mode selection, and order submission that clears cart and navigates to confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerLoginPage.tsx: Customer-facing login page that uses Internet Identity authentication with feature highlights and redirects authenticated users to their dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/CustomersPage.tsx: Customer management page with authentication check, displaying a list of customers with bulk selection, individual/bulk notification sending, and an add customer form.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying a hero banner, alert panel, dashboard metrics, and sales/profit trends chart.
frontend/src/pages/InventoryPage.tsx: Inventory management page with tabs for stock status, stock in, stock out, and write-off operations.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Admin login page using Internet Identity authentication with passwordless, biometric-supported secure login and automatic redirect after successful authentication.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Order confirmation page displaying order ID, estimated preparation time, and navigation options to track order or return to menu.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Admin orders page displaying all orders in an expandable table with status management, customer details, and order item breakdown.
frontend/src/pages/OrderTrackingPage.tsx: Public order tracking page allowing users to search orders by phone number or order ID and view order status timeline and details.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Product management page with a dialog-based form to add new salad bowls and a list displaying existing products.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Displays exportable reports (inventory, sales, subscriptions, expenses) with mock data and CSV export functionality. Each report card shows an icon, description, and export button.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionsPage.tsx: Manages customer subscriptions with a dialog form for adding new subscriptions, a list view, and a KOT (Kitchen Order Ticket) print feature.
frontend/src/pages/UserDashboardPage.tsx: User-facing dashboard with three tabs (Profile, Menu, Orders) that render respective section components for customer self-service.
frontend/src/pages/UserMenuPage.tsx: Public menu page displaying active salad bowl products with hero banner, product cards showing images/prices by bowl size, and a detail dialog for product selection.
frontend/src/utils/bmiCalculator.ts: Utility functions to calculate BMI from height and weight, categorize BMI values (underweight/normal/overweight/obese), and return appropriate color codes.
frontend/src/utils/csvExport.ts: Provides functions to export sales and inventory data to CSV files with proper headers, formatting, and automatic download triggers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL parameter utilities supporting hash-based routing, with functions to extract, persist, and clear parameters from URL and sessionStorage, including sensitive data cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color palette (fresh/warm themes), OKLCH color space, container settings, extended utilities, and animation keyframes for accordion components.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking a full-stack salad business web application with admin panel (inventory, billing, analytics, subscriptions) and customer ordering interface. Documents 7 known issues including non-functional admin login, broken edit/delete operations, and UI flickering problems.
